name: Dante's Infernal Dig [Ludum Dare 45]
description:
Dante has never thought he would have to dig a hole to Hell with nothing, but shovel… Collect souls to upgrade yourself, summon minions and become a demon! *still in development

Made by Kirill “TwinSides” Gonin & Anastasia “ASch” Shmakova. Our first game and jam, btw.
